com.versant.event
Class ChannelBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.event.ChannelBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassChannelBuilder, ObjectChannelBuilder, QueryChannelBuilder
public abstract class ChannelBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Used to specify the properties of a channel. The ChannelBuilder can be used to construct a new channel, or to modify an existing channel.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

ChannelBuilder

public ChannelBuilder()
Method Detail

addEventType

public void addEventType(int type)
Adds an event type for this channel. Events of this type will be generated by the ODBMS and distributed to all listeners of this channel. If this event type has already been specified for the channel, then this request is ignored.

See Also:
EventTypes

addEventTypeRange

public void addEventTypeRange(int lower,
                              int upper)
Adds a range of event types for this channel. Events whose types fall in the numerical range between (and including) lower to upper will be generated by the ODBMS and distributed to all listeners of this channel.

See Also:
EventTypes

getEventTypes

public int[] getEventTypes()
Returns the array of event types for this channel. The array is structured as sequence of range pairs. Each pair specifies a lower and upper bound of event types.

See Also:
EventTypes

removeEventType

public void removeEventType(int type)
Removes an event type for this channel. Events of this type will no longer be generated by the ODBMS or distributed to listeners of this channel.

See Also:
EventTypes

removeEventTypeRange

public void removeEventTypeRange(int lower,
                                 int upper)
Removes a range of event types for this channel. Events whose types fall in the numerical range between (and including) lower to upper will no longer be generated by the ODBMS or distributed to listeners of this channel.

See Also:
EventTypes

setEventTypeRanges

public void setEventTypeRanges(int[] types)
Sets the event type array for this channel. The array is structured as a sequence of range pairs. Each pair specifies a lower and upper bound of event types. This method will overwrite any previously set event types. Due to the way the array is structured the types array should always be of even length.

See Also:
EventTypes
